content:
http://conman.clinfhir.com/connectathon.html?event=con28 > Vulcan/Gravitate Health - Electronic Product > Servers tab

Scenario Step 3 - Manage and display acquired PL documents for the patient:

Actions:

  1. Prepare summary index of downloaded PLs.
  2. Open and display the Norwegian version of the PL for the first medicinal product.
  3. Switch to display the Greek version of the PL for the same medicinal product.
  4. Switch to display the English version of the PL for the same medicinal product.
  5. Close the PL and go back to the summary index of downloaded PLs.
  6. Open and display the Norwegian version of the PL for the second medicinal product.
  7. Switch to display the Greek version of the PL for the second medicinal product.
  8. Switch to display the English version of the PL for the second medicinal product.
  9. Close the PL and go back to the summary index of downloaded PLs.
Jay Gustafson has marked this topic as resolved.
